resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In
Search for any product or cocktail
How do I create an account?

To create an account, click on the \'Register\' button on the login screen. Fill in your first name, last name, email address, and password, then click \'Register\'. You will receive a confirmation email to activate your account.
What information must I provide to register?
You need to provide your first name, last name, email address, and create a password.
How do I reset my password?
If you forgot your password, click on the \'Forgot password?\'; link on the login screen. Enter your email address and you will receive instructions on how to reset your password.
How do I search for cocktail recipes?
To search for cocktail recipes, use the search bar at the top of the main screen. Enter the name of the cocktail or any ingredient you have, and a list of matching recipes will be displayed.
Can I save my favorite cocktails?
Yes, you can save your favorite cocktails by clicking on the\'Favorite\' button on the cocktail recipe page. You can access all your favorite cocktails from the \'Favorites\' section in the menu.
How do I add a new cocktail recipe?

To add a new cocktail recipe, go to the \'Add\' section from the menu. Fill in the required details like title, ingredients, and description, then click \'Submit\'. Your recipe will be added to the list.
How do I edit my personal information?
To edit your personal information, go to the \'Settings\' section from the menu. Here you can update your name, email address, and password.
What should I do if the app is not working properly?
If you encounter any issues with the app, try restarting it. If the problem persists, contact our support team through the \'Contact\' section in the menu.
Yes, your personal information is securely stored and encrypted. We do not share your information with third parties without your consent.
